text:
- [Narrator] Customers
across industries are looking

at machine learning to
drive business innovation,

improve user experiences,
and provide better analytics,

but a major hurdle to successfully
adopt machine learning
at scale is the cost of inference.

AWS Inferentia is Amazon's
first machine learning chip,

built from the ground up, to
accelerate inference workloads.

It delivers up to 2.3
times higher throughput,
and up to 70% lower costs compared
to GPU-based EC2 instances.

Each Inferentia chip
contains four neuron cores
to efficiently accelerate
a wide range of deep learning models.
Pre-trained models can be deployed quickly

on Inferentia-powered
Amazon EC2 Inf1 instances,

with just a few lines of
code, using AWS Neuron SDK,
which comes integrated
with leading machine learning frameworks.
AWS Neuron automatically optimizes models
to deliver the highest performance

on Inferentia for natural
language processing,

computer vision, recommendation
engines, search, and more.

AWS Inferentia democratizes
machine learning
and makes it easy for developers

to integrate it into
all their applications.
Get high-performance and the lowest cost

machine learning inference
in the AWS Cloud today.
